content:
/>
X.i.4.C.3.f
.
When Further Development Is Required on Alleged Non-Entitlement
If the letter alleging nonentitlement contains specific assertions of fact,
not
mere generalities, and it appears that the writer has knowledge of the circumstances, complete any necessary development to include a field examination, if required.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
